name: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
author: Nikola Tesla

name: I’m not a great programmer. I’m just a good programmer with great habits.
author: Kent Beck

name: I'm generally a very pragmatic person: that which works, works.
author: Linus Torvalds

name: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.
author: Donald Knuth

name: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it.
author: Donald Knuth

name: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

name: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
author: Albert Einstein

name: Sometimes it is the people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.
author: Alan Turing

name: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

name: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.
author: Kurt Cobain

name: It's hard to build momentum if you're dividing your attention.
author: James Clear

name: Deconstruction creates knowledge. Recombination creates value.
author: James Clear
